Name: Rhodes State Office Tower
Notes: Has been the tallest building in Columbus and the tallest mid-block skyscraper in Ohio since 1973. Tallest building constructed in Columbus in the 1970s.

Name: LeVeque Tower
Notes: Tallest building constructed in Columbus in the 1920s.

Name: William Green Building
Notes: Tallest building constructed in Columbus in the 1990s.

Name: Huntington Center
Notes: Tallest building constructed in Columbus in the 1980s.
